name: At His Heel
description:
This is a final university project. 

A retelling of the story of Jacob and Esau from the Book of Genesis in the Old Testament, inspired by desert steampunk aesthetic. 

Jake must decide whether to obey his mother and betray his older twin brother Esom by duping his father and taking Esom’s birth right or listen to his guardian Angel and follow his culture’s traditions.

Feeling overshadowed by his older brother, unloved by his father, controlled by his mother, nagged by the Angel, and abandoned by God, you go through Jake’s inner turmoil and family drama.

Make the wrong decision, and things will turn ugly.
